original_title: Mound of earth disrupts train operations on Upcountry Line
original_body_lines: Train operations on the Upcountry Line have been disrupted after a mound of earth collapsed on to the tracks this evening (Dec.06), the railways department said.
The incident took place between Ohiya and Idalgashinna railway stations.
Accordingly, trains plying to Badulla will be terminated at Ohiya railway stations until the tracks are cleared.
